Detailed Description

This class is a dynamic obstacle in a chunk.

It moves around every frame and you can collide with it.

void ChunkDynamicObstacle::move ( float  dTime  )  [virtual]

If we move but have no chunk then try to find one.

Derived classes should call this method _after_ they move.
